findings.title: Unused code
findings.description: Unused code can cause an increase in computations (and unnecessary gas consumption), indicate bugs or malformed data structures, and decrease the readability of the code.

findings.title: Single quote found in string variables
findings.description: Single quotes are used in string variables instead of double quotes.

findings.title: transfer() is being utilized
findings.description: Low-level transfer() function has been found to be used in the contract at lines 148, 177 and 172.
